name: Stuart Smith
text: Pretty good pizza! The building is strange and shared with a Wendyâ€™s.

name: Brian Howell
text: The mariaccia chicken pizza is amazing.  Always high quality food here.  Highly recommend.

name: V R
text: I took a " first timer " to the Morrison Blvd location at 9:34 p.m. They close at 10 p.m. She absolutely LOVED it. Alex was the AGM (Asst General Manager) working and Brianna was at the register. As it happened, a well known former Carolina â€¦More

name: Malissa Mcburney
text: First, let me say that I feel that I am a Pizza Connoisseur. I love PIZZA and I love seeking out great pizza places. With that being said... this place absolutely ROCKS! I wasn't for sure, before eating there, if this was just going to be another pizza place with just okay" pizza. However

name: Tamara Ramseur-Doughty
text: Being from Ohio we were excited when Donatos moved into the SC/NC area. Unfortunately the location near us closed so we now drive 40 minutes one way for our pizza and we are never disappointed. Friendly faces, fresh pizza and there is always a promotional coupon

name: John Vollat
text: The pepperoni pizza is unique and 90% of people probably will dig it and 10% will probably dislike it. I grew up eating it and it's comforting to have one location left in Charlotte. It is located in an usual area that feels like a mall or â€¦More

name: Skipper Pond
text: So glad this location is still open.   Great freshly made pizza.  Side salad is reasonably priced and good.  I'd recommend.

name: Jessika G.
text: Ahhh being from Ohio i love this! my  pizzas are always hot n correct. Donatos  needs another location up north.. i eat most of my pizza before i get home!! very good pizza..

name: Kamilia L.
text: One of my absolute  fav pizza chains. The chicken Mariachi is my absolute fav pizza.  It has spice and a cooling sour cream on the side. I know, your like what? Sour cream? Well its spicey enough that you need a cooling agent. It tickles the tummy and your esophagus if you like it hot ask for extra jalapenos! â›½ðŸŒ¡ðŸ”¥

name: Lisa Johnson
text:
This place is AMAZING! Great service! The gentleman (Jay) that rang us up was patient and so nice! The cooks were adaptive and up to a challenge! We had a complicated order and it was a busy time of day! The food came out quick and tasted wonderful! The 45 minute drive was so worth it and we will be back!!!!!
THANK YOU ALL!!!!

name: David Turner
text: Great service and always great pizza. Fresh toppings, quality food. I grew up on this pizza in it's birthplace and mine Columbus, Ohio.

name: Lambros Balatsias
text: Their thin pepperoni pizza is amazing. I would love to try other menu items but can never pass up this pizza to try anything else!

name: Rene Howard Jr.
text: Good quality pizza!  It is not like the other common big chain pizza places. There is a drive thru to pick up along with Wendy's in joint venture.

name: Cynthia Thompson
text: Donatos Pizza, I use to live down the street from southpark. So I would order a lot from your restaurant. The subs, and different pizza's..Everything fresh and so yummy! Just love your food still. Another favorite place to eat in charlotte.

name: Tiki Ki
text: We absolutely love coming here to eat. The staff is always extremely friendly. The food is always extremely fresh. Awesome Pizza..

name: Allison Renirie
text: This restaurant is amazing. I've never been to Donato's before, but their customer service and commitment to quality has me hooked! Manager Chris and Mr. Jamel were so kind and proud of their products! Two thumbs up!

name: Cecilia Rideout
text: i love their pizza . I eat there once a week and the owners and staff treat me as if i were a member of the family . But the reason i eat there regularly is the pizza is outstanding and worthy of a 5 star rating . The pizza has a tremendous amount of toppings

name: Ishmael Kendall
text: I was very dissatisfied. The wings were tiny, and the wing sauce was not flavorful. The pizza crust was yuck! Ive had better frozen. The salad was average...ion know. I will say I had an issue with my order and the staff was nice...it was â€¦More

name: Chad Hart
text: Finally a great pizza place in a state known for terrible pizza. The people of North Carolina wouldn't know a good pizza if you beat them over the head with one.

name: Jessika B
text: I'm from Ohio so I was very excited to learn there was a Donatos here! I have ordered from the South Park location several times. Usually the pizza takes forever and it comes to my house cold and the extra sauces I requested never seem to â€¦More

name: Sunny Bennett
text: Food is classic chain. Good, not anything special, BUT the prices were great and no wait. What makes this a 4 star vs. 3 star is the staff. Very very nice. Wish I'd known about this place when I lived close by. I'd of come here a lot.

name: db60615
text: The quality and taste of the pizza was amazing!  They also had a sitting area for you to eat as well.  The customer service was great as well.  I will most definitely return.

name: Courtney Cawthon
text: Margherita pizza has sprinkles of (dried?) flavorless basil, and no balsamic drizzle, as pictured online. So this is just a cheese and tomato pizza and not worth the price. That said, basil aside, seemed like good quality, and thin crust â€¦More

name: lauren brown
text: pizza was not good. way to much sauce

name: Angela Wheeler
text: I've had Donato's before. First time at this location. We ordered a veggie and cheese pizza. Both pizza were amazing! They got our order wrong but quickly corrected it. Superior service! We will definitely return.

name: James Eads
text: Awesome food. Delivery was super fast. From the time I ordered it only took 10 minutes to getfood

name: Brian Doughty
text: Best Ohio Pizza in North Carolina, I'm a born and raised Buckeye 4Life

name: Derek E
text: Hands down best pizza place in Charlotte,  highly recommend their founder's favorite pizza .

name: Umesh Jain
text: Great price,  good customer service , garlic cheese bread and veggie pizza were very tasty. The address was little confusing, when you use Google maps and arrive at the place, then you will find that place is under construction.  Then we â€¦More

name: Christopher W.
text: Kinda funky environment as its a mall-style feel. Not sure which category to put it in? The food was as expected (and maybe even better) and the staff was very friendly. No wait time makes it a good last-minute choice and the prices were â€¦More

name: Miguel Basaldua
text: Awesome people, terrible pizza.  The toppings are cut so large that the crust didn't get cooked it was mushy.  The sauce is terribly sugary and very heavy handed.  The crust it's self wasn't cooked all the way so I would say its chewy with â€¦More

name: Shari Hasty
text: The food was excellent and the staff was very friendly.

name: Ms. Ree
text: A little pricey for what you get, but the food and service is good. 'The works' personal pizzas or the sandwiches. Mmmm

name: Patty Smith
text: I really like their subs and you can get a salad too, part of their pick 2.

name: Kiera Laeka
text: From Ohio - Was so happy to see that there was a Donatos in Charlotte. Has lived up to my expectations every time. Delicious!

name: Lillian White
text: Sooooooooo good! Cheesiness mmmmmmmm

name: Michelle F
text: Great pizza and great customer service!!!!

name: Brittany Kline
text: Great pizza. We usually stop her if we are coming through the area and we live an hour away.

name: Shanki Malik
text: Good place to have thin crust pizza.. and salads bowls are good to have

name: Richard Gray
text: Had 2 pizzas and both tasted NOT so good! Wish I could get a refund, I won't order from here ever!!! The veggie pizza w/$25 worth of tomatoes and chunks not sliced green peppers..... not cool!

name: Chetan Newaskar
text: Pizza here have unique taste and it's a must try once if you are in Charlotte.

name: John Mat
text: Very nice price. Great food and deals!

name: Timothy Saula
text: The Pizza taste  and smells great . Close to dominion's . Great customer service.

name: richsmck
text: Good pizza and subs beats all chain pizza

name: Tina Pettice
text: Great food. fast service

name: Rick M

name: Steven keyes

text: We love donatos.

name: Layne

name: Alicia Roseboro
text: The young staff so nice

name: Joseph Leon Pickett Jr
text:
Cleanliness is a major concern for me here.
About 3 months ago,I ordered a lunch combo.
When I got that combo back to my work I noticed debris floating around in the â€¦More

name: Brian B
text: I love Donatos. Too bad they have closed most local locations. I still visit when I am near Southpark. The pizza is always good.

name: Bri Bri
text: Donato's pizza is always delicious and this location has fantastic employees

name: Philip Greenberg
text: I love this pizza. Wish they would open one in the Weddington area.

name: ONBOSS HOOVER
text: Well I'm from Ohio, where Donatos was born. I think it's the BEST pizza ever. My absolute favorite pizza. DELICIOUS!!!!! I cannot believe that it isn't very successful here, but ask anyone from Ohio about Donatos ;)

name: Shain Wingrove
text: I Ordered at 1031 it was at my door at 1050. Very fast, loaded toppings.

name: Nate Tucker
text: Great pizza fresh ingredients every time

name: Boyd Jenkins

name: Michael Spangler

name: Richard Mazzola
text: Kiddos love the crazy cuts in the pizza.

name: Michael Petro
text: Excellent pizza, great prices, and superior service...an unbeatable trio

name: kaledev
text: Not great. Takes forever to get your food. More like fast food pizza.

name: Tanner Johnson
text: Took pizza close to an hour and they sent a second order of pizza and wings for free. Nice gesture.

name: Michael Hazard
text: Food was to my liking very good

name: Christopher Romas
text: You got to be kidding that pizza is the worst.First an 8" pizza has hardly any taste can not taste the cheese.Has a burnt taste and look.Price was almost $10 which is ridiculous for that awful garbage.I have had frozen pizza that was bigger â€¦More

name: Brian Jackson
text: Very nice staff fast service

name: Tyler Mowry
text: Heaven.  Greatest pizza in the world

name: Carmen Santiago
text: All ways a good pizza.

name: Paul Fortner
text: The pizza's not good. Neither is the service. At least at this location. Never been to the others. (Doubt I will)

name: antione browning
text: I love this place!! Endseia and Brittany are the best!!

name: Vicki Hunter
text: Love them wings, food is great

name: Sid Jeri
text: Like the quality of the food I ordered. Bad location. I came the night before and didn't stop because it look like it was not open.

name: Corporate Park
text: The pizza is horrible.Taste like it is burnt.Very overpriced had a 8 inch pizza with tax almost 10 bucks.Really don't even taste the cheese.Not made  fresh while you wait taste like they microwave it.Red Baron frozen pizza is much better.This pizza is a insult to real pizza.Never will go back even it was free for a year.

name: Jon Pearson
text: Had a meatball sub, pretty sure it was covered in ketchup. Not the best.

name: James Fain
text: My new favorite pizza.

name: Linda Ross
text: Good food at great prices!!!

name: Bill Cunningham
text: Worst pizza I've ever had.  Cracker-thin crust.  Excessively peppery, extremely salty sauce.  Annoying square pieces.  Stay home and eat a peanut butter sandwich before coming here.

name: Charlie Adams
text: Best pizza in the south!

name: Debbie Marcinkoski

name: Matthew Hazelbaker
text: Some of the best thin crust around!

name: Dale Crawford
text: Out standing, just wish it was closer than 30 miles

name: Martell Cheeks
text: Unfortunately I can't eat this awesome because I'm on a strict diet but I would highly implore you to if you can or just find one in your area. You're missing out. All you really need is the pepperoni and you're set!

name: Denise Penn
text: Very friendly staff and patient.  A little overpriced but I had a pizza, subs and  chicken and it was very tasty.

name: Johnny Norvell
text: Best pizza on the block.

name: Byron R.
text: Friendly and professional staff! Great food!

name: Chris M
text: Dined in. Felt like I was eating in a subway terminal. Very dingy place at night you don't feel safe. I would Definetly get it to go or have them deliver if you live near by.  And the price is very high for this quality pizza.
